data.comment: The big names in today's match at The Hawthorns have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, West Bromwich needs to be cautious. Aston Villa have an attacking throw-in.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to West Bromwich just outside Aston Villa's area.
In West Bromwich West Bromwich's Karlan Ahearne-Grant is caught offside.
In the minute 3, Grady Diangana (West Bromwich) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Goal! Anwar El Ghazi gives Aston Villa a 0-1 lead in West Bromwich.
Bertrand Traore with an assist there.
In the minute 6, Throw-in high up the field for West Bromwich in West Bromwich.
Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of West Bromwich.
Corner awarded to West Bromwich.
In the minute 13, Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
Throw-in for Aston Villa at The Hawthorns.
John McGinn for Aston Villa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
Goal kick for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 19, Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Matt Targett is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 20, West Bromwich will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Aston Villa.
Matt Targett is back on the pitch.
Aston Villa surge into the attack at The Hawthorns but John McGinnâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the home team in West Bromwich.
Ollie Watkins (Aston Villa) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Martin Atkinson awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Martin Atkinson signals a Aston Villa throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
Martin Atkinson awards the away team a throw-in.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 31, In West Bromwich a free kick has been awarded the away team.
West Bromwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in West Bromwich.
Free kick Aston Villa.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 34, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
Jake Livermore West Bromwich.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to West Bromwich.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Aston Villa's Ollie Watkins has run offside.
In the minute 39, West Bromwich are in shooting range from this free kick.
Kortney Hause (Aston Villa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
West Bromwich's Matt Phillips is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 43, Aston Villa to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in the half of West Bromwich.
Free kick in a good position for Aston Villa!
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in West Bromwich.
Aston Villa's Anwar El Ghazi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at The Hawthorns.
Anwar El Ghazi for Aston Villa drives towards goal at The Hawthorns. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jack Grealish of Aston Villa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's a goal kick for the home team in West Bromwich.
In the minute 51, John McGinn (Aston Villa) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Martin Atkinson awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Aston Villa push forward at The Hawthorns and Anwar El Ghazi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Bromwich defence.
Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
Throw-in for Aston Villa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
Throw-in for Aston Villa at The Hawthorns.
Can Aston Villa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Bromwich's half?
In the minute 59, Anwar El Ghazi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Aston Villa.
Ball safe as West Bromwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 61, Aston Villa pushes forward through Ollie Watkins, whose finish on goal is saved.
Aston Villa have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 62, At The Hawthorns, Karlan Ahearne-Grant has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Martin Atkinson blows against Aston Villa's John McGinn for offside.
In the minute 66, Tyrone Mings (Aston Villa) gets a yellow card.
Martin Atkinson awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 68, Free kick Aston Villa.
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bertrand Traore (Aston Villa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 73, Aston Villa's Ollie Watkins is whistled for offside at The Hawthorns.
Throw-in Aston Villa.
Aston Villa's Anwar El Ghazi gets in a shot on goal at The Hawthorns. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 75, Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Bromwich's half?
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to West Bromwich.
In the minute 77, Sam Allardyce (West Bromwich) is making a first substitution, with Charlie Austin replacing Matt Phillips.
Jack Grealish of Aston Villa is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 78, The home team have replaced Grady Diangana with Branislav Ivanovic. This is the second substitution made today by Sam Allardyce.
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
In the minute 83, Sam Allardyce is making the team's third substitution at The Hawthorns with Callum Robinson replacing Karlan Ahearne-Grant.
Aston Villa take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Bertrand Traore.
In the minute 84, Great play from Jack Grealish to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bertrand Traore (Aston Villa) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by West Bromwich defenders.
In the minute 86, An attacking Aston Villa player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Anwar El Ghazi nets and Aston Villa extend their lead to 0-3. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Martin Atkinson signals a West Bromwich throw-in in Aston Villa's half.
In the minute 89, Martin Atkinson awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
Aston Villa drives forward and Anwar El Ghazi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Martin Atkinson will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Martin Atkinson awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Aston Villa.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Aston Villa's Douglas Luiz misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
Aston Villa's John McGinn breaks free at The Hawthorns. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-3.
